SectionBody.Text: As used in this chapter, the term:

Subsection.Text: “Electrologist” means a person who engages in the practice of electrolysis.

“Electrolysis or electrology” means the permanent removal of hair by destroying the hair-producing cells of the skin and vascular system, using equipment and devices approved by the board which have been cleared by and registered with the United States Food and Drug Administration and that are used pursuant to protocols approved by the board.
